text: Ingvar Oldsberg (31 March 194510 February 2022) was a Swedish television presenter and sports reporter. He was best known for hosting På spåret between 1987 and 2009. He was also the host of Bingolotto, starting in 2014. Oldsberg was born in Mölnlycke, Sweden. Oldsberg died on 10 February 2022, at the age of 76. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Swedish television presenters Category:Sports commentators Category:People from Gothenburg Category:Swedish journalists
title: Ingvar Oldsberg
